#BREAKING: The House has passed HR 582, the #RaiseTheWage Act! I’ve been fighting to raise wages for 3 decades, and I was thrilled to help lead the effort to pass this bill! #ForThePeople

Passing the #RaiseTheWage Act will          
✅ Increase pay for up to 33 million workers.                
✅ Lift 1.3 million out of poverty.           
✅Boost the economy.
It’s time to vote yes and raise the wage!
Looking forward to voting for HR 582, the #RaiseTheWage Act to increase the minimum wage to $15/hr. Just another way House Democrats are working #ForThePeople! pic.twitter.com/Zg6QNKU8qt
I'll be on the House floor this morning speaking out in support of the #RaiseTheWag Act! Watch live here:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?462652-1/house-session&live …

Today is the day! We’re voting on the #RaiseTheWage Act. As Chairwoman of the @EdLaborCmte Subcommittee on Workforce Protections, I was proud to help get this bill across the finish line, and I urge my colleagues to vote yes!
President Trump is a racist. End of story. #IStandWithIlhan #TrumpRallyNC
House Democrats pledged to work #ForThePeople. Tomorrow, we’re voting on the #RaiseTheWage Act to put more money in the pockets of hard-working Americans!
The federal minimum wage hasn’t increased from $7.25/hr in ten years. America’s workers deserve better. I urge my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to pass H.R. 582, the #RaiseTheWage Act.
The American people deserve a raise. This week, Congress has the chance to give them one. It’s time to vote for H.R. 582 and #RaiseTheWage to put money in the pockets of hard-working Americans.

Passing the #RaiseTheWage Act will          
✅ Increase pay for 40 million workers.                
✅ Lift 1.3 million out of poverty.           
✅Boost the economy.
It’s time to vote yes and raise the wage!
